items.name: The OG
items.desc: Grilled ham, cheese, mayo, ketchup, green tomatoes, and onion.

items.name: The Boss Hog
items.desc: Shredded pork, cheese mayo, garlic cilantro aioli, green tomatoes, and pickled mojo onions.

items.name: The Chick Magnet
items.desc: Shredded chicken, cheese, mayo, ketchup, green tomatoes, and onion (BBQ, buffalo, chipotle).

items.name: The Triple Threat
items.desc: Shredded chicken and pork, grilled ham, cheese, green tomatoes, mayo, and pickled mojo onions.s

items.name: The Spicy Gobble
items.desc: Smoked turkey, crispy bacon, pepper jack cheese, spicy chipotle mayo, arugula, tomato and pickled mojo onions on toasted sourdough

items.name: The Habana Press
items.desc: Layers of roasted shredded pork, ham, Swiss cheese, pickles, and mojo onions, and mustard pressed between crispy baguette.

items.name: The Veggie Sensation
items.desc: Grilled zucchini, red pepper, avocado, goat cheese, chipotle aioli on toasted sourdough

items.name: The Chopped Cheese
items.desc: Classic NYC bodega sandwich with ground beef, melted cheese, peppers, onions, ketchup, mayo, lettuce and tomatoes on a toasted sub roll.

items.name: The Breakfast Sammy
items.desc: Toasted sourdough stacked with crispy bacon, fluffy scrambled eggs, melted cheese and smoky chipotle mayo.

items.name: The Crazy Dog
items.desc: Grilled hotdog topped with seasoned ground beef, sautéed onions & peppers, melted cheese, shredded cabbage & carrots, plus a drizzle of mayo and ketchup sprinkled with sweet corn and chips.

items.name: Mamey
items.desc: Rich, creamy blend of mamey fruit, evaporated milk, vanilla extract and ice delivering a naturally sweet and smooth flavor.

items.name: Mango
items.desc: Creamy blend of fresh mangoes, evaporated milk, vanilla extract and ice creating a smooth and refreshing drink.

items.name: Passion Fruit
items.desc: Rich, creamy blend of passion fruit and evaporated milk, delivering a naturally sweet and smooth flavor.

items.name: Banana
items.desc: Rich, creamy blend of bananas, evaporated milk, vanilla extract and ice delivering a naturally sweet and smooth flavor.

items.name: Strawberry
items.desc: Rich, creamy blend of fresh strawberries and evaporated milk and ice delivering a naturally sweet and smooth flavor.
